item.title: Report X-2024041556
item.description:
Report X-2024041556

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-02T15:12:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PRRC 170322 (HYDROCARBONS, LIQUID, N.O.S.) released 5 gallons of product on track 206 in Laurel yard. No waterways impacted. manway bolts found less than tool tight. contractor responded, found the manway bolts loose, repair was to tool tightened the manway bolts properly. The tank car weas cleaned of spilled material. no ground impacts observed.
